meanings.definition: A chemical compound containing the amido group, -NH2.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of the amido compound.
meanings.sent2: The amido group is an essential part of many organic molecules.
meanings.sent3: The amido compound and its properties fascinated the students in chemistry class.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the amido group was as sharp as a well-honed blade.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the amido structure appeared intricate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: A derivative of ammonia in which one or more hydrogen atoms are replaced by an acyl group.
meanings.sent1: The chemist synthesized a new amido derivative in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Amido compounds are commonly used in pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent3: The amido derivative reacted unexpectedly, causing a small explosion.
meanings.sent4: The amido compound's transformation was as dramatic as a caterpillar becoming a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of the amido derivative lingered in the air after the experiment.
